title: North Korea's Military Is More Advanced Than You Think

title: "For us, AI stands for All Inclusive...India's experience with digital public infrastructure can be extremely useful to the world": PM Modi at Global Fintech Fest
description: Noting that India's approach to Artificial Intelligence (AI) is based on three key principles - equitable access, population-scale skilling, and responsible deployment - Prime Minister Narendra Modi said on Thursday that the country has always advocated for a global framework for ethical AI and its experience with digital public infrastructure and learning repositories can be extremely useful to the world.

title: US companies' profit growth seen softer, spotlight on AI spending
description: U.S. companies could report milder earnings growth in the third quarter than earlier this year, partly due to a likely tariff hit, while investors look for signs that heavy spending on artificial intelligence is paying off.

title: CEO Eric Schmidt shares warns of homicidal AI models
description: Artificial intelligence models are vulnerable to hackers and could even be trained to kill humans if they fall into the wrong hands, said ex-Google CEO Eric Schmidt.
content:
Talk about a killer app.
Artificial intelligence models are vulnerable to hackers and could even be trained to off humans if they fall into the wrong hands, ex-Google CEO Eric Schmidt warned.

title: AI & sustainability will be growth story of this century, says Nicholas Stern
description: Artificial intelligence is crucial for managing the transition to sustainable cities, energy, and transport systems, according to Nicholas Stern. He emphasized that climate finance is integral to development finance, with rich nations having a responsibility to support investments in developing countries. Developing economies will need an additional $1 trillion annually by 2030 for climate initiatives and sustainable development goals.
